name: co-assets-compiler
readme: ## Assets compiler for CompoundJS [](http://travis-ci.org/#!/compoundjs/assets-compiler) This package adds middleware for assets compilation. Supported asset types: - less - stylus - sass - coffee-script ## Installation Step 1. install using npm: npm install co-assets-compiler --save Step 2. add `co-assets-compiler` line to `config/autoload.js`, for example: ```javascript module.exports = function (compound) { return [ 'ejs-ext', 'jugglingdb', 'seedjs', 'co-assets-compiler' ].map(require); }; ```
